description: This file implements an observability client in Python for sending logs and metrics to a monitoring and logging service. It includes functions for authentication headers, timestamp generation, and asynchronous functions to send logs and metrics, utilizing environment-based settings and external HTTP client library.

methods.name: _auth_headers
methods.description: Generates authorization headers for HTTP requests based on environment settings.

methods.name: _now_iso
methods.description: Returns the current UTC timestamp in ISO 8601 format.

methods.name: send_log
methods.description: Asynchronously sends a log message to the monitoring service, including optional metadata and correlation ID.

methods.name: send_metric
methods.description: Asynchronously sends a metric payload to the monitoring service, including optional metadata and correlation ID.
